Articles.Content:
Hello everybody,

I just thought about a challenge, here it is!

I hope you guys like it!

Story:

The scientists at KSC saw abnormal seismic activity in the Jool system on the moon Bop.

They requested that the rocket guys would send a manned crew to it to investigate what was going on there.

So Jebediah called his friends Bill and Bob to build a rocket that would go to Bop, land at the coordinates, and report what was going on.

Challenge (Optional):

Build a rocket that can reach Bop with 3 crew (Doesn't have to be Jebediah, Bill and Bob but, if you can definetily do it!).

Go to Bop.

Land here: (Source: Click here!)

Report what you found. (Make Screenshots of the trip.)

Story:

It is the Kraken, it is coming back to life!

We have to somehow stop it!

All the Kerbals at KSC are panicing.

Then they here Jebediah say trough the radio: "Don't panic you stupid! Build a prison and imprison him. We will keep him busy for now!"

The REAL Challenge

Build a prison. This can build out of different buildings. Doesn't have to be a gigant cube of structural panels.

Send it to Bop. Make sure the Kraken doesn't escape.

Rules:

Do what the Challenge says.

No use of Hyperedit, debugwindow. This means NO HAXORING!

All mods that aren't really cheaty like Hyperedit or mods that add fueltanks, engines & and that kind of parts aren't allowed. (Mechjeb & Flight Engineer are allowed.)

Make a screenshot every now and then for proof.

Have fun! (You better have otherwise i'll be sad )

Scoring:

You can get a maximum of 110 points: 10 for the Optional Challenge and 100 for the real challenge.

Optional Challenge

Completion: 10

Real Challenge

Defense : 80

This contians: How many usefull building/turrets, affectiveness of buildings.

Style/ the Swagger : 20

This contains: Are you buildings realistic, do they look nice.

I'll decide how many points you will get.
